alert.note: Alert for Northern Fairfield; Northern Middlesex; Northern New Haven; Northern New London (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued May 15 at 3:45AM EDT until May 17 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY MORNING THROUGH WEDNESDAY EVENING FOR INLAND SOUTHERN CONNECTICUT... The National Weather Service in Upton has issued a Fire Weather Watch, which is in effect from Tuesday morning through Wednesday evening. * AFFECTED AREA...Northern Fairfield, Northern New Haven, Northern Middlesex and Northern New London. * TIMING...From late morning into the early evening hours on Tuesday and Wednesday. * WINDS...Northwest 10 to 20 mph with gusts up to 30 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low the lower 20s percent. * TEMPERATURES...In the mid 60s. * LIGHTNING...none. * IMPACTS...rapid fire spread if ignition occurs.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for further updates regarding this potential.

area.areaDesc: Northern Fairfield; Northern Middlesex; Northern New Haven; Northern New London
